verses.verse: And the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> <WH8802> with me came again <WH7725> <WH8799>, and waked <WH5782> <WH8686> me, as a man <WH376> that is wakened <WH5782> <WH8735> out of his sleep <WH8142>,

And said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, What seest <WH7200> <WH8802> thou? And I said <WH559> <WH8799>, I have looked <WH7200> <WH8804>, and behold a candlestick <WH4501> all of gold <WH2091>, with a bowl <WH1531> upon the top <WH7218> of it, and his seven <WH7651> Menorahs <WH5216> thereon, and seven <WH7651> pipes <WH4166> to the seven <WH7651> Menorahs <WH5216>, which are upon the top <WH7218> thereof:
And two <WH8147> olive trees <WH2132> by it, one <WH259> upon the right <WH3225> side of the bowl <WH1543>, and the other <WH259> upon the left <WH8040> side thereof.
So I answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and spake <WH559> <WH8799> to the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> <WH8802> with me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, What are these, my lord <WH113> ?

Then the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> <WH8802> with me answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, Knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> thou not what these be? And I said <WH559> <WH8799>, No, my lord <WH113>.

Then he answered <WH6030> <WH8799> and spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, This is the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> unto Z'rubavel <WH2216>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Not by might <WH2428>, nor by power <WH3581>, but by my spirit <WH7307>, saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>.

Who art thou, O great <WH1419> mountain <WH2022>? before <WH6440> Z'rubavel <WH2216> thou shalt become a plain <WH4334>: and he shall bring forth <WH3318> <WH8689> the headstone <WH68> <WH7222> thereof with shoutings <WH8663>, crying, Grace <WH2580>, grace <WH2580> unto it.
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the YY <WH3068> came unto me, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

The hands <WH3027> of Z'rubavel <WH2216> have laid the foundation <WH3245> <WH8765> of this house <WH1004>; his hands <WH3027> shall also finish <WH1214> <WH8762> it; and thou shalt know <WH3045> <WH8804> that the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> hath sent <WH7971> <WH8804> me unto you.

For who hath despised <WH936> <WH8804> the day <WH3117> of small things <WH6996>? for they shall rejoice <WH8055> <WH8804>, and shall see <WH7200> <WH8804> the plummet <WH68> <WH913> in the hand <WH3027> of Z'rubavel <WH2216> with those seven <WH7651>; they are the eyes <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>, which run to and fro <WH7751> <WH8789> through the whole earth <WH776>.

Then answered <WH6030> <WH8799> I, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, What are these two <WH8147> olive trees <WH2132> upon the right <WH3225> side of the candlestick <WH4501> and upon the left <WH8040> side thereof?

And I answered <WH6030> <WH8799> again <WH8145>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, What be these two <WH8147> olive <WH2132> branches <WH7641> which through <WH3027> the two <WH8147> golden <WH2091> pipes <WH6804> empty <WH7324> <WH8688> the golden <WH2091> oil out of themselves?
And he answered <WH559> <WH8799> me and said <WH559> <WH8800>, Knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> thou not what these be? And I said <WH559> <WH8799>, No, my lord <WH113>.
Then said <WH559> <WH8799> he, These are the two <WH8147> anointed <WH3323> ones <WH1121>, that stand <WH5975> <WH8802> by the YY <WH113> of the whole earth <WH776>.
